title: encryption app 0.4 breaks music scanning
body:
server configuration
operating system: ubuntu 12.04 server
web server: apache/2.2.22 
database: mysql 5.5.31
php version: php 5.3.10
owncloud version: 5.0.9



i enabled the encryption app (0.4) in owncloud 5.0.9.after enabling encryption the music app seems to have forgotten about the meta information of my (around) 1.1gb of music.

![no_meta_information](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1536691/819089/95cec0e8-efaa-11e2-9021-3a98ef20dc6a.png)

when i hit the rescan library button the scanning process seems to be started, but the progress bar stays at the starting point.
![media_scanning](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1536691/819095/be4ed7ec-efaa-11e2-8ec5-bc29ece836ca.png)


looking at the log files i can see the following message apperaing at that moment:

{"app":"php","message":"allowed memory size of 536870912 bytes exhausted (tried to allocate 18446744072962024110 bytes) at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/apps\/files_encryption\/lib\/crypt.php#231","level":4,"time":1374151495}

wait...what? trying to allocate 18446744072962024110 bytes? that seems a bit much ;)
